content.value:
Sgreen Duplex Hostel is near Parque Del Perro and San Antonio in the heart of the city with restaurants, bars, pubs, clubs gyms and open green spaces. Near the boulevard del Rio, Peñon and several interest places. Two blocks from the metro which give you access to all the city very fast.

It has comfortable bed in the main room and sofa bed in the base floor.

Situated in Cali, 1 km from Pan-American Park, SGreen Duplex Apartments I features rooms with air conditioning. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The inn has family rooms.
At the inn, rooms are fitted with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. The rooms at SGreen Duplex Apartments I are fitted with a seating area.
The accommodation offers a à la carte or American breakfast.

Saint's Peter Cathedral is 3.1 km from SGreen Duplex Apartments I, while Jorge Isaacs Theater is 3.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Alfonso Bonilla Aragón International Airport, 24 km from the inn.

description.description: Sgreen Duplex Hostel is a totally furnished duplex with A/C, equipped kitchen, 43 inch smart TV with Netflix included in a very safe zone. Ideal for business travelers and families. Ideal for long or short stances, silence, you can work with our high speed WiFi, or entertain with Netflix and chill.
